title: Paternity judgment, acknowledgment, support order; social security number
context: [ยง584-23.5] Paternity judgment, acknowledgment, support order; social security number. The social security number of any individual who is subject to a paternity judgment or acknowledgment, or support order issued under this chapter shall be placed in the records relating to the matter. [L 1997, c 293, pt of ยง8]
